product_name: CamelBak Rogue Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Rogue hydration pack melds an efficient low-profile silhouette with enough storage for a couple of hours on your bike. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir is equipped with a redesigned, easy-to-open filler cap. Holds up to 200 cu. in. of gear; plenty of space for a multi-tool, tube, tire levers, energy bars, keys and your wallet. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, ensuring no leakage during transport. Air Director(TM) ventilated back panel with Air Mesh shoulder harness enhances cooling airflow. Overflow storage for pump, extra tubes, jacket and so forth. Zippered external top pocket includes a handy clip that makes it easy to find your keys at the end of the ride. Camelbak Rogue hydration pack has reflective detailing that increases your visibility in low light.
short_description: The CamelBak Rogue hydration pack melds an efficient low-profile silhouette with enough storage for a couple of hours on your bike.
